TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebEventFormatter extends System.Object

summary.span: 设置 ASP.NET 状况监视事件信息的格式。

span.span: Formats ASP.NET health monitoring event information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，用于管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在管理运行状况事件期间帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 是支持的类型用于进行统一格式与事件相关的信息，这很有用，如果必须记录事件数据，并将其更高版本提供给用户...The is a supporting type used to uniformly format event-related information, which is useful if the event data must be logged and later presented to the user.. 实例类作为参数传递给由运行状况事件类型定义的格式设置方法。Instances of the class are passed as arguments to the formatting methods defined by the health-event types. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件信息的格式。The following code example shows how to use the to format event information. 它主要旨在显示要使用的正确语法。It is mainly intended to show the correct syntax to use. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AppendLine(string s) cil managed

param.name: s
param.span: 要添加到事件信息中的字符串。

span.span: The string to add to the event information.

summary.span: 将指定的字符串和一个回车追加到事件信息。

span.span: Appends the specified string and a carriage return to the event information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法，可通过添加您自己的特定事件的数据自定义事件信息。The method allows you to customize the event information by adding your own event-specific data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int IndentationLevel { int get(); void set(int value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the indentation level.

value.span: 缩进等级使用的制表符的数量。

span.span: The number of tabs used for the indentation level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以控制如何缩进的事件信息。The property allows you to control how the event information is indented. 缩进的基本单位由属性。The base unit of indentation is defined by the property. 对于每个缩进级别，你将增加缩进一个选项卡。For each indentation level, you increase the indentation one tab. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int TabSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置制表符大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the tab size.
The number of spaces in a tab.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以控制写入事件信息时使用的选项卡大小。The property allows you to control the tab size used when writing event information. 确定的每个单位的缩进，由控制的空格数属性。The determines the number of spaces per unit of indentation, controlled by property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#19)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string ToString() cil managed

summary.span: 以字符串格式返回事件信息。

span.span: Returns the event information in string format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用内部变量来存储事件信息。The uses an internal variable to store the event information. 这方法使你能以字符串格式中获取所有信息。This method allows you to get all the information in a string format.
